entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
